comment.author: 58612208@N00
comment._content: My father worked as antenna engineer at Tidbinbilla in Australia which relayed these images. I remember him telling me the story of this picture when i was a kid. I always suspected it wasn't true - now there is proof :) Here are some pictures from the control room at Tid while the mission was underway: www.honeysucklecreek.net/other_stations/tidbinbilla/marin... The same facility (vastly improved) relayed the first images from Curiosity
